name: Save Tigers With Suhail
description:
Save Tigers With Suhail

This game was developed in 2013 as a school project. I was given the creative freedom to create something to bring awareness to the world about saving tigers. The answer I had was a video game for it.

Save Tigers With Suhail is a combination of four different game styles. 

  • Game Style 1: A 2D based adventure game where the hero, Suhail saves Tigers by freeing them from cages. All this has to be accomplished without losing lives.
  • Game Style 2: A Brick Breaker Game to get the player pumped up in saving the ball and breaking each brick smoothly to gain points.
  • Game Style 3: A Quiz Game that brushes on the knowledge about the Tigers and how special they are as a species.
  • Game Style 4: A 2D Maze Game where the tiger has to escape without getting trapped in nets.

( All the audio tracks used in this game does not belong to me. I used them because I like them. I make no profit out of this. It is just an experimental project done in school days. )

Save Tigers With Suhail was an exciting project for me as this was the project that was established first under Star Studios.

Go ahead and do try this game out. Do share your experience with others. And most importantly, Save Tigers :)
